content.text:
Here is my attempt at the task:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
AFFIDAVIT OF JOHN SMITH
State of New York
County of Kings

John Smith, being duly sworn, deposes and says:

1. I am over the age of 18 and competent to make this affidavit.

2. I have personal knowledge of the facts set forth herein.

3. On June 1, 2023, I witnessed the motor vehicle accident that occurred at the intersection of Main St. and 1st Ave. in Brooklyn, NY.

4. I saw a blue sedan, traveling northbound on 1st Ave., run the red light and collide with a green minivan that was proceeding through the intersection westbound on Main St. on a green light.

5. The blue sedan was traveling at an excessive rate of speed, which I estimate was 50 mph in a 30 mph zone.

6. I called 911 to report the accident and remained on scene to provide a statement to the responding police officers.

DATED: June 15, 2023
Brooklyn, New York

[Signature]
John Smith

Sworn to before me this
15th day of June, 2023

[Notary Signature and Stamp]
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
